name: The limbo of loss
description:
Made for the "PangPangJam #Limbes", this game designed in Bitsy tells a very personal story about the tragedy of loss and its aftermath. How from one moment to another life can break down and leave you in limbo for years. This game doesn't have a happy ending, but it doesn't have an ending either, which is hopeful.  

The game will undergo some minor changes in terms of design and translation (if you detect errors, please let me know).

It can be played in about 15-20 minutes.

------- CREDITS ------- 
Design: Miguel Valverde
Music: "Beautiful oblivion" -Scott Buckley (www.scottbuckley.com.au). License (CC BY 4.0)
